title: The Winds of Change are Blowing in the Renewables Market - BCG
summary: RWE is investing in offshore wind, onshore wind, PV, batteries, and green hydrogen to provide better solutions for the efficient use of energy sources globally. The company is also investing in underlying technologies, such as complex fluid dynamics modelling, to optimize energy yield. RWE believes that floating offshore wind will expand the applicability of offshore wind to many new geographies.

title: Banpu NEXT forays into Asia-Pacific market for battery energy storage system, spearheaded by Durapower to capture ... - PR Newswire
summary: Banpu NEXT, a leading smart energy solutions provider in Asia-Pacific, is making its full foray into its battery business by joining forces with its subsidiary Durapower, a global leader in performance lithium-ion battery storage solutions. The partnership aims to establish Banpu NEXT as a vertically-integrated player in the battery business and expand its range of products and services for enterprise customers. Durapower's expertise in battery materials, design, manufacturing, and lithium-ion battery technologies will support Banpu NEXT's transition to Net-Zero society and its commitment to providing Total Smart Energy Solutions.
